alert.note: Alert for Eastern Magic Valley; Shoshone, Lava Beds; Southern Hills, Albion Mountains (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 25 at 6:40PM MDT by NWS Pocatello
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Lincoln, north central Cassia and southern Minidoka Counties through 730 PM MDT... At 640 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 19 miles northwest of Minidoka to near Declo. Movement was north at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Burley, Rupert, Heyburn, Paul, Declo, Albion, Acequia, Kimama and Interstate 84 And 86 Junction. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Magic Valley; Shoshone, Lava Beds; Southern Hills, Albion Mountains
